definition: to be of one mind/to work as one
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort/working hard together

sentences.english: Do you cooperate with coworkers to get things done?
sentences.chinese: 你是否能和同事齐心协力将事情办好？

sentences.english: Amber and the staffs coordinate their efforts to issue the new photo album.
sentences.chinese: 郭采洁和工作人员齐心协力，为了推出新的写真集。

sentences.english: Can the Mohist swordsmen pull together to help Mohists survive the greatest crisis since its emergence?
sentences.chinese: 众高手能否齐心协力撑过墨家有史以来最大的危机？

sentences.english: Team spirit- be whole-hearted, and emphasize team work.
sentences.chinese: 团结是指齐心齐力，重视团队合作，以达永续经营。

sentences.english: All our Party comrades have worked as one man and made marked achievements in every held.
sentences.chinese: 全党同志齐心协力，在各项工作中得到了显著的成绩。

sentences.english: Philippians 1:27 Stand firm in one spirit, contending as one man for the faith of the gospel.
sentences.chinese: 同有一个心志，站立得稳，为所信的福音齐心努力。

sentences.english: We need Democrats and Republicans to work together to help grow this economy.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要民主党人和共和党人齐心协力帮助增长经济。

sentences.english: Or you can look at the children in Qixin village.
sentences.chinese: 或者看看齐心村的孩子们。

sentences.english: The people struggled together against fascism.
sentences.chinese: 人们齐心与法西斯主义作斗争。

sentences.english: We need to work together to understand what each group is trying to achieve.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要齐心协力去理解每个小组试图达到的目标。

sentences.english: Team up with your Ghost squad to accomplish the most complicated missions.
sentences.chinese: 幽灵战队齐心协力以完成最复杂的任务。

sentences.english: We must take concerted action and cut his claws .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须齐心合力，斩断他的魔爪。

sentences.english: The division of their respective work together, the goal was reached.
sentences.chinese: 他们各自分工齐心合力，目标终于达成。

sentences.english: Make sure you and your partner are working together on this.
sentences.chinese: 请务必让你和你的伴侣在这方面齐心协力。

to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort/working hard together
of one mind (idiom)

unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
to unite/unity/solidarity/united
concerted efforts in a common cause (idiom); united and working together
Tongxin county in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia
to be of one mind/united/concentric
to be of one mind/to think or act alike
to unite in common effort
anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united
to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection
to resist the enemy
